theorem_title: Proof of Communication Token Complexity Bound for Low-Rank Recurrent Coordinator
key_results: Communication cost exactly r * d tokens per step
Token savings proven for r < d compared to full-rank
Monotonicity in both rank and dimension established
implications: Provides rigorous theoretical foundation for low-rank coordinator design, quantifies token savings as function of rank, and guides hyperparameter selection for multi-LLM systems
